author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Fibresteel Industries Pte Ltd v Radovic Dragoslav
counsel: A Rajandran (A Rajandran) for the plaintiff; Goh Aik Chew (Goh Aik Chew & Co) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Interim orders/Defendant's application for security for costs/Whether filing of defence crucial to assessment of merits of plaintiff's case/Whether reason to believe plaintiff unable to pay costs if defence successful/Whether defendant's application oppressive/Whether any admission to plaintiff's claim made by defendant
